location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 3189/41 'Iraq - Request by G.O.C. Basra. for 14 miles of piping from the Anglo Iranian Oil Co.'

physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged in approximate reverse chronological order.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 6; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located at the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between HM Ambassador to Iran and the Foreign Office, regarding a request from the General Officer Commanding Iraq for the export from Iran of materials needed for the provision of a military water supply. Owing to the difficulties foreseen in obtaining the agreement of the Iranian Government, it is suggested that the materials be obtained instead from Kirkuk or Bahrein.A list of correspondence references contained in the file appears on the front cover.
